analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ContributorApprover.eligibleTestAndIncrement (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#77-85):
	External calls:
	- result = eligible(contributor,amountInWei) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#79)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- participated (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#81-84)

KyberNetworkTokenSale.KyberNetworkTokenSale (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#103-133) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(kyberMultiSigWallet,_premintedTokenSupply) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#129-133)

KyberNetworkTokenSale.finalizeSale (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#189-194) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.burn(token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#193-194)

KyberNetworkCrystal.emergencyERC20Drain (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,amount) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol)

Reentrancy in KyberNetworkTokenSale.buy (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#151-181):
	External calls:
	- weiPayment = eligibleTestAndIncrement(recipient,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#159-160)
	External calls sending eth:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value.sub(weiPayment)) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#165-166)
	- sendETHToMultiSig(weiPayment) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#168)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- raisedWei (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#171)

Reentrancy in KyberNetworkTokenSale.proxyBuy (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#140-148):
	External calls:
	- amount = buy(recipient) (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#141-143)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- proxyPurchases (/unique_chucks/1/0xd6cd31f283d24cfb442cba1bcf42290c07c15792.sol#146)
